# Viewing Pictures

## Shooting

Display live view or movie footage on a TV or save it to an external recorder that supports HDMI input.

## Playback

To start playback, press the camera !Playback Button button. The camera monitor turns off and pictures and movies are output to the HDMI device. Note that the camera volume controls have no effect on sounds played on the TV; use the television volume controls to adjust the volume.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> Some televisions may briefly display a black screen when movie playback begins.
